mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (brand, model, `desc`, goods_category_id) VALUES (#{brand}, #{model}, #{desc}, #{goodsCategoryId})
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET brand = #{brand}, model = #{model}, `desc` = #{desc}, `count` = #{count}, goods_category_id = #{goodsCategoryId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods ORDER BY id DESC
